thread.title: Neville insists Wenger deserves respect on Arsenal Fan TV | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Neville insists Wenger deserves respect on Arsenal Fan TV | Daily Mail Online

author: Ben Nagle For Mailonline
title: Neville insists Wenger deserves respect on Arsenal Fan TV | Daily Mail Online
text: Gary Neville sticks to his guns on Arsenal Fan TV, insists Arsene Wenger deserves respect and refuses to apologise for calling fan an 'idiot' Gary Neville was invited on to Arsenal Fan TV after calling supporter an 'idiot' He disagreed with 'Wenger Out' banner and stuck to his guns on YouTube show Neville says Arsenal fans will regret forcing Wenger out if he leaves this season Ex-Manchester United defender says he doesn't regret calling fan an idiot Neville believes Wenger deserves more respect after 20 years of loyal service
